credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Wall Decoration for Cosimo III de' Medici
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and watercolor, black chalk, graphite on white laid paper
description: Vertical rectangle. Statue of the armoured king, galloping to the left (to be executed in high relief), standing upon a console before a background ofrose marble. Frame of metal with blue marble as inner part. On the top two winged putti upon a volute, holding with their right hands a blue ball with three golden lilies and lifting with their left hands a royal crown.
name: Drawing
